channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg reveals the morning routine that’s ‘better than caffeine’
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg reveals his morning routine—and how he recovers from looking at his phone.

item.title: Stock market retreat in Trump’s first 100 days is among worst starts for a president in almost a century
item.description: In President Joe Biden’s first 100 days, the S&P 500 surged more than 9%. Under Trump, it’s tanked almost 8%.

item.title: Trump’s first 100 days in office have cost Elon Musk $113 billion of his net worth
item.description: The Tesla CEO has lost 25% of his wealth as he nears the end of his tenure as a “special government employee.”

item.title: Major food brands will stop using artificial dyes. Here’s why RFK is sounding the alarm
item.description: A series of studies have raised concerns by associating synthetic food colorings with health risks from hyperactivity to cancer.

item.title: Humanitarian aid for Africa is drying up. It’s hard but I see an opportunity to build something better
item.description: African ingenuity must step forward in this sobering moment—and we’re already scaling local solutions.

item.title: Amazon says consumer cost of Trump tariffs won’t be surfaced on main site
U.S. consumer confidence fades for fifth straight month
Home-price growth fizzles as U.S. economic uncertainty weighs on would-be buyers
Sherwin-Williams and Honeywell help power Dow’s 170-point gain early Tuesday
If you love gold at near record high prices, why not wear it?
